Welcome to the CRSG, this is a tutorial level to make sure you know how to play. You can start right away by giving a quick glance to the GUIDE to find the errors. Then you can review the code.

When you have found a defect, select the line(s) it is in. Than press the add button in the right corner below. It will be added to your defect list, from there you can select the reason for the defect.

Remember to make use of your checklist and guide . If you are not sure about the type of defect that you have found or how to select it, you should refer back to the guide. -Bilsen Team

This level will be your first real taste of the game. This level consists of a simple java class written relatively well. Still something with this code smells. As always select the error reasons carefully and reasonably in order to get more points. Source: [acarturk-e (https://github.com/acarturk-e/CS101-Lab-Assignments/blob/master/lab03/lab03a/Lab03a.java)]
